meanings.definition: The quality of being able to see things clearly at a distance.
meanings.sent1: His farsightedness allowed him to spot the mountain from afar.
meanings.sent2: Her farsightedness made her a great bird watcher.
meanings.sent3: The farsightedness of the owl impressed the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His farsightedness in business helped him avoid many pitfalls.
meanings.sent5: The captain's farsightedness saved the ship from crashing into the rocks.

meanings.definition: The ability to predict or plan for the future with wisdom and foresight.
meanings.sent1: Their farsightedness in investing early paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent2: The politician's farsightedness in policy-making gained her respect.
meanings.sent3: The farsightedness of the fortune teller amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her farsightedness in decision-making was like having a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's farsightedness led to groundbreaking discoveries.
